titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Henrietta Covert school record book 1978.051
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:19:08 +0000.

did.abstract: The school record book of Henrietta Covert, from Jamaica, Long Island. The volume contains entries from March through October of an unidentified year, along with newspaper clippings and a program from Jamaica Public School Graduating exercises from 1876.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Henrietta Covert school record book, 1978.051, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of the New Canaan Historical Society, 1975.
